title: Bitlayer Token Presale Concludes with $4M Target
summary: The Bitlayer (BTR) token presale on CoinList ends August 7, 2025, offering tokens at $0.15-$0.20 to non-US users and accredited US investors with a $4M fundraising target. This represents a significant fundraising milestone for the Bitlayer ecosystem development.

title: Babylon Social Distributes 600M BABY Tokens in Airdrop
summary: Babylon Social targets social media contributors and early supporters with a 600 million BABY token airdrop (6% of 10 billion total supply). Registration closed August 4, 2025, requiring users to connect social accounts and wallets via the official portal.

title: dYdX Activates Full Onchain Governance for $8M Treasury
summary: On August 4, 2025, dYdX activated full onchain governance for its Community Treasury, giving token holders direct control over $8M in funds. This represents a significant step toward decentralized autonomous governance for the derivatives trading platform.
